about.title: About CodeUtilsHub
about.subtitle: CodeUtilsHub is a community platform for developers, providing and sharing useful utility functions to accelerate software development processes.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We believe that sharing knowledge and tools will help the developer community grow stronger. CodeUtilsHub was created to become a hub for high-quality utility functions, helping developers save time and focus on solving important business problems.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the leading platform for sharing and discovering utility functions, where every developer can find the tools they need and contribute their own solutions to the community. We aim for a world where programming becomes more efficient and enjoyable.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We are committed to providing high-quality, thoroughly tested utility functions.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a strong developer community where everyone learns and shares together.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously updating and improving to bring the most advanced tools.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: All source code is open source, everyone can contribute and learn.

stillNeedHelp.title: Still need help?

whatIs.question: What is CodeUtilsHub and how does it work?
whatIs.answer: CodeUtilsHub is a community platform for developers to provide and share useful utility functions. You can search, use, and contribute functions to accelerate software development processes. The platform supports multiple programming languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python.

howToUse.question: How do I use functions from the library?
howToUse.answer: You can browse functions in our library, view their documentation and examples, test them in the playground, then copy the code or install via package managers. Each function comes with detailed usage instructions and examples.

howToContribute.question: How can I contribute my own functions?
howToContribute.answer: You can contribute by going to the Contribute page, filling out the function submission form with your code, documentation, and examples. Our community will review your submission and provide feedback before it's published.

isItFree.question: Is CodeUtilsHub free to use?
isItFree.answer: Yes, CodeUtilsHub is completely free to use. All functions are open source and available to everyone. We believe in the power of community-driven development.

whatLanguages.question: What programming languages are supported?
whatLanguages.answer: Currently we support JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. We're constantly adding support for more languages based on community demand.

howToSearch.question: How do I search for specific functions?
howToSearch.answer: Use our advanced search feature to filter by language, category, complexity, tags, or keywords. You can also browse by categories or use the trending functions section.
